mapper.select: select ad_id ,ad_name ,ad_type ,ad_location from ( select ad_id ,ad_name ,ad_type ,ad_location ,CASE WHEN @partitionBy_1 = ad_location THEN @row_number:=@row_number+1 ELSE @row_number:=1 END AS ind ,@partitionBy_1:=ad_location AS p from advertisement a cross join ( select @row_number:=0,@partitionBy_1:=null ) b where a.ad_status = '1' and a.ad_location >= #{localMin} and a.ad_location < #{localMax} and a.ad_start_time <= now() and a.ad_end_time > now() order by a.ad_location , a.ad_start_time desc ) x where x.ind = 1

select concat('/pic.htmls?p=',coalesce(image_url ,'')) as image_url ,coalesce(image_index ,'') as image_index ,coalesce(information_link ,'') as information_link from advertisement_image where ad_id = #{ad_id} order by image_index
